Menace
When this creature transforms into Tharja, Dark Knight, you gain life equal to the greatest amount of life lost among your opponents this turn.
[i]Elfire[/i] – Whenever Tharja becomes blocked, she deals 2 damage to each blocking creature.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Tharja attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, that player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
